title: "[STORY] {short title}"

---

## Story
Brief description of the user story or task.

## Acceptance Criteria
- List of measurable acceptance criteria (Given/When/Then or bullet points).

## Priority
- P0 / P1 / P2 / P3  (Explain reason)

## Estimates
- Story points or engineering hours

## Dependencies
- Related issues, epics, or external services

## Notes
- Implementation hints, tests required, security considerations
